mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict_value (ID, DICT_TYPE_ID, LABEL, CODE, SORT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_dict_value set LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, DICT_TYPE_ID, LABEL, CODE, SORT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG from sys_dict_value where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, DICT_TYPE_ID, LABEL, CODE, SORT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG from sys_dict_value where CONCAT(IFNULL(`LABEL`,'')) LIKE '%${search}%' and DICT_TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, DICT_TYPE_ID, LABEL, CODE, SORT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG from sys_dict_value where DICT_TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, DICT_TYPE_ID, LABEL, CODE, SORT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG from sys_dict_value
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_dict_value
ID,
DICT_TYPE_ID,
LABEL,
CODE,
SORT,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_DATE,
UPDATE_BY,
UPDATE_DATE,
DEL_FLAG,
values
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.dictTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{item.delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update.foreach:
update sys_dict_value
DICT_TYPE_ID=#{item.dictTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LABEL=#{item.label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE=#{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT=#{item.sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY=#{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE=#{item.createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATE_BY=#{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE=#{item.updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
DEL_FLAG=#{item.delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} DICT_TYPE_ID = #{item.dictTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
